metadata.description: What if there really was a Garden of Eden - a place with a history before the first people we know of? A civilization  cursed and banished underground for breaking their own commandment to live in balance with the  Earth. When an evil coal operator discovers that the "sacred" carbon can burn forever, he will sacrifice  the land and the people to extract the full deposit. When he awakens and releases a hell the surface world cannot imagine, the only thing that stands in the way of the ecological disaster, is a disgraced, ex-pro baseball pitcher and a  community of courageous coal miners
metadata.name: Carbon
